name: Storycraft
description: Stories, myths, legends: within each lies a world unto itself, where characters act out their trials and tribulations over and over as their tales are told and retold.

skinlines.name: Mythmaker
skinlines.description: Long ago, the defeat of the Great Beast Galio gave rise to Lunar New Year traditions that are carried on through the retelling of that epic tale. Within the story itself lies a living world all its ownâ€”but when the world of the story is suddenly interrupted, the characters must work together to fix the mess and see their own myth through.
